1.SceneDescription: Central Perk, everyone is there as Chandler and Monica enter. Oh, and Joey isNEWLINEwearing a FDNY T-shirt to make this the first nod to the tragedy that Friends have made.

lines.Line: I know it’s last minute, but we decided to have a Halloween party
And everybody has to wear costumes. (And there’s generalNEWLINEdisconcertment.) Come on! It’ll be fun

Please tell me you’re not gonna dress up like a dinosaur
(exhales sarcastically) Not two years in a row
(exhales sarcastically) Not two years in a row

No way! Look, Halloween is so stupid! Dressing up, pretending to beNEWLINEsomeone you’re not

That hot girl from their wedding

Now wasn’t Joey hitting on her at the wedding too
That’s right! He was hitting on her, and I got her. I guessNEWLINEthe better man won. (To Joey) Please don’t take her from me

2.SceneDescription: Monica and Chandler's, The Halloween party has started. Monica is setting outNEWLINEsome food as Rachel enters.

lines.Line: Wait! You’re supposed to wear a costume

Oh! Oh! Can I give out the candy? I really want to be with the kidsNEWLINEright now. Y’know, ever since I got pregnant I-I have the strongest maternalNEWLINEinstincts
(to them) Just a minute!!! (She takes the candy and opens the door toNEWLINEtwo parents, a witch, a clown, and a cowgirl.) Look at you guys! Wow! You are a very scaryNEWLINEwitch. (Gives her candy.
And you are a very funny clown. (Gives him candy.

(to the cowgirl) And you are so in style right now. Y’know, I workNEWLINEat Ralph Lauren and the whole fall line has got this like equestrian theme goingNEWLINEon. I don’t suppose you saw the cover of British Vogue, but
(interrupting) Can I just have the candy
(interrupting) Can I just have the candy

Ah, Catwoman. So we meet again
(entering from the bedroom wearing a big, pink bunny costume) Monica!NEWLINECan I talk to you for a second? Listen, I appreciate you getting me the costume

(To Monica) Oh, you did this to him

The Velveteen Rabbit was brown and white
Well, it was either a pink bunny or no bunny at all
Well, it was either a pink bunny or no bunny at all
No bunny at all!! Always no bunny at all!!
Yes I did! I’m Chandler. (Looks at Chandler) Dude, what happened
Okay. I’m Chandler (makes a growling/gurgling sound at the end andNEWLINEthe girls laugh.
When have I ever done that?
When have I ever done that?! (And does the sound again.
When have I ever done that?! (And does the sound again.
There’s a knock on the door.
There’s a knock on the door.
Oh! (Opens the door to reveal a ballerina) Well you’re just theNEWLINEprettiest ballerina I’ve ever seen
Oh wow! That deserves another piece of candy
Oh wow! That deserves another piece of candy
Well, I have to say that earns tutu pieces of candy
Well, I have to say that earns tutu pieces of candy
Ohh… Oh, honey here. Take it all. (Pours the entire large bowl intoNEWLINEher bag and closes the door.) Monica! We need more candy
What?! There’s only been like four kids
What?! There’s only been like four kids
What?! There’s only been like four kids
Yeah I know, but one of them just said that she loved me so I just gaveNEWLINEher everything
(entering) Hey! (He’s wearing a costume as well.
(entering) Hey! (He’s wearing a costume as well.
What are you supposed to be

Remember the Russian satellite, Sputnik? (They all look at him.) Well,NEWLINEI’m a potato or a…spud. And these are my antennae. (Points to the colander withNEWLINEan old TV antenna glued on top that he’s wearing.) So Sputnik, becomes…NEWLINE(They’re still confused) Spud-nik. Spudnik
Wow! I don’t have the worst costume anymore
Wow! I don’t have the worst costume anymore
(sees Ross) Hey all right, Ross came as doody
(sees Ross) Hey all right, Ross came as doody

lines.Line: Joey gives him the okay symbol, and Ross rushes towards him to be stopped by Chandler.NEWLINEMeanwhile, Phoebe goes over to the snack table as some guy, which turns out to be Ursula'sNEWLINEfiancée Eric, walks in and smacks her butt.

Okay, I just slapped my future sister-in-law’s ass

Eric. (They shake hands and he’s squinting. And, no, it’s notNEWLINEme.

Why are you looking at me like that
‘Cause the sweat’s getting in my eyes and its burning
Okay. (Hands him a napkin.) So, what are you
Okay. (Hands him a napkin.) So, what are you
I don’t think they have a name for it. It’s just I get nervous;NEWLINEI start sweating like crazy
Oh umm, I’m the solar system. (He’s wearing a black sweater withNEWLINEthe planets glued on around the sun.) Yeah, my students helped me make it—I teach theNEWLINEsecond grade
Yeah! It’s so much better than first grade when you don’t knowNEWLINEwhat’s going on and definitely better than third grade. Y’know with allNEWLINEthe politics and mind games

Y’know you don’t have to stand here with me, believe me

Oh I feel very lucky, she’s great. I think she’s the mostNEWLINEbeautiful woman I’ve ever seen

lines.Character: [Time lapse, Monica is going over to talk to Joey
lines.Line: Time lapse, Monica is going over to talk to Joey.

(walking over) Hey. Ursula’s fiancée is really sweet!NEWLINEHe’s a teacher, he does all this volunteer work. Y’know normally y’know, INEWLINEdon’t like really sweaty guys. But this one? I could just mop him up
You’re getting a crush on your sister’s fiancée

lines.Character: (There’s a knock on the door and Rachel opens it to a little girl
lines.Line: There’s a knock on the door and Rachel opens it to a little girl.

Hello handsome. (Sees Ursula over her shoulder) Oh God. (Walks away inNEWLINEshame as they kiss.) Oh look at you two. So when did you guys meet
Yeah, I know it sounds crazy, and it’s not like me to do something soNEWLINEimpulsive, but she’s just so perfect, and we have so much in common
Huh? (Ursula motions for Phoebe to keep quiet.
And we were both in the Peace Corps

Peace Corps, really? (Ursula motions, I don’t know.
Peace Corps, really? (Ursula motions, I don’t know.
In fact when we were building houses in Uruguay, we were, we were just twoNEWLINEtowns apart and we never met
Yeah. It wasn’t a town when I got there, but it was a town when INEWLINEleft. (To Eric) Shall we get me really drunk

lines.Character: [Cut to Mona and Ross walking past Chandler
lines.Line: Cut to Mona and Ross walking past Chandler.
That’s funny. Yeah. Y’know you’re the funniest man here inNEWLINEa pink bunny costume his wife made him wear

Monica and I were talking about who could kick whose ass in a fight, youNEWLINEor Ross

I cannot believe you didn’t pick me

lines.Line: Y’know the only reason he’s marrying you is because he thinksNEWLINEall the things you were saying about yourself were true

(entering) Pheebs come on! Bunny vs. Doody! We’re waiting! (They goNEWLINEinside.) (To Chandler and Ross.) Okay. Okay guys, one match, winner take all. (They graspNEWLINEeach other’s hand in preparation for battle.) Oh wait-wait! What does the winner get

the crowd has left and only Mona, Monica, Joey, and Phoebe are stillNEWLINEwatching to see who will be able to move the other’s arm first. An event that has yetNEWLINEto happen.

Fine. (He lets Ross win.) Oh no!

(finds it) What a relief. It has all the numbers of the people in herNEWLINEprayer chain
